attributes.action: Protect British Culture - Protect British Boosh
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Broadcasters in the U.S are bidding for the right to create an American version of the hit comedy The Mighty Boosh. 

American remakes of British TV shows are almost uniformly awful. 

If American companies like our ideas for our shows so much they should just broadcast our shows. 

I ask the Prime Minister to consider protection for our cultural exports, including TV shows, so that this sort of thing can not be allowed to happen.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
